channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oura Ring 4 Ceramic review: A colorful glow-up
item.description: If you want a pop of color and style, then the Oura Ring 4 Ceramic might be the smart ring for you.

item.title: Chinese Beverage Chains Spread Across the US, Challenging Starbucks' Dominance
item.description: Luckin Coffee, Chagee, and other Chinese brands are targeting US consumers with Instagram-worthy drinks sold through sleek mobile apps.

item.title: DOJ Issued Seizure Warrant to Starlink Over Satellite Internet Systems Used at Scam Compound
item.description: A new US law enforcement initiative is aimed at crypto fraudsters targeting Americans—and now seeks to seize infrastructure it claims is crucial to no...

item.title: 30 Best Early Black Friday Deals on WIRED-Tested Gear (2025)
item.description: We found early Black Friday deals on WIRED-tested smart bird feeders, smartwatches, vacuums, and more.

item.title: Our Favorite Webcam Is Marked Down by $35
item.description: Save a chunk of change on Logitech's high-end USB webcam.

item.title: Five people plead guilty to helping North Koreans infiltrate US companies as ‘remote IT workers’
item.description: The U.S. Department of Justice said five people — including four U.S. nationals — "facilitated" North Korean IT workers to get jobs at American compan...

item.title: Boeing has a carbon emissions problem. Startup Charm Industrial is cleaning up.
item.description: The deal will see Charm Industrial collect forestry waste and transform it into a bio-oil it buries underground.

item.title: OpenAI says it’s fixed ChatGPT’s em dash problem
item.description: OpenAI says users can now personalize ChatGPT to stop using the em dash in its output.

item.title: German court rules Google must pay €572M for violating antitrust rules in price comparison sector
item.description: A German court has found that Google has abused its dominant market position in the price comparison sector, ruling that the company must pay a total ...

item.title: Black Friday 2025: Expert Tips for Finding the Best Deals
item.description: The biggest retail event of the year has grown into an entire month of sales that ebb and flow. Here’s how to make the most of it.
